info.description: This is the API documentation for the zODC Masterflow Service. It provides endpoints for managing workflows, requests, forms, and nodes.
info.title: zODC Masterflow Service API

basePath: /api/v1  // Adjusted BasePath for clarity (e.g., /api/v1) - Ensure routes match this prefix

get.description: Trả về danh sách tất cả các category có trong hệ thống.
get.summary: Lấy danh sách tất cả Category

500.description: Lỗi Server Nội Bộ

get.description: Retrieves detailed data of a specific submitted form by its ID.
get.summary: Get form data by ID

400.description: error: Invalid ID or service error

get.description: Retrieves a list of form templates, optionally filtered by category ID and search query.
get.summary: Find all form templates

parameters.description: Search query for form template names or descriptions
parameters.name: search

500.description: Error message for internal server error

post.description: Adds a new form template to the system based on the provided data.

400.description: Error message for bad request

500.description: Error message for internal server error

get.description: Retrieves the form template used for editing a user's profile.
get.summary: Get edit profile form template

400.description: error: Service error or unable to retrieve the form template

get.description: Retrieves the form template used for performance evaluations.
get.summary: Get performance evaluation form template

400.description: error: Service error or unable to retrieve the form template

put.description: Updates the details of a specific form template by its ID.

400.description: error: Invalid ID, bad request, or service error

get.description: Retrieves detailed information of a specific form template using its ID.
get.summary: Get form template detail by ID

400.description: error: Invalid formTemplateId or service error

get.description: Find all history by request id
get.summary: Find all history by request id

400.description: Bad Request

500.description: Internal Server Error

put.description: Approves a specific node based on its ID. The user must have permission to approve the node.

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, permission issues, or service error

get.description: Retrieves all comments associated with a specific node.
get.summary: Get all comments for a node

400.description: error: Invalid node ID or service error

post.description: Adds a comment to a specific node, submitted by the authenticated user.
post.summary: Create a new comment on a node

400.description: error: Invalid input or service error

patch.description: Marks a specific node as completed by the logged-in user.

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing ID, invalid ID, service error)

get.description: Retrieves the form associated with a node, considering the user's permission level.
get.summary: Get node form based on permission

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing params, service error)

put.description: Edits a specific form data associated with a node, requiring node ID and form ID.
put.summary: Edit a form associated with a node

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, form ID, or service error

put.description: Approves a specific form based on node ID and form ID. The user must have permission to approve the form.
put.summary: Approve a form associated with a node

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, form ID, or service error

put.description: Rejects a specific form based on node ID and form ID. The user must have permission to reject the form.
put.summary: Reject a form associated with a node

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, form ID, or service error

post.description: Submits form data for a specific node based on node ID and form ID. Requires user authentication and valid data.
post.summary: Submit a form associated with a node

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, form ID, or submission error

get.description: Retrieves the Jira-specific form details associated with a node.
get.summary: Get Jira form for a node

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing ID, service error)

put.description: Reassigns a specific node to a new user based on node ID and user ID. The current user must have permission to reassign the node.
put.summary: Reassign a node to a new user

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, user ID, or service error

put.description: Rejects a specific node based on its ID. The user must have permission to reject the node.

400.description: error: Invalid node ID, permission issues, or service error

patch.description: Marks a specific node as started.

400.description: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing ID, service error)

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about the tasks associated with a specific node.
get.summary: Get task details for a node

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing ID, service error)

get.description: Returns the total number of tasks associated with a specific node.
get.summary: Get task count for a node

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., invalid ID, service error)

get.description: Retrieves a list of stories that are assigned to a specific user (assignee) on a given node.
get.summary: Get stories assigned to a user on a node

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., missing ID, service error)

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of requests based on various filter criteria for the logged-in user.
get.summary: Find all requests

400.description: error: Error message for bad request (e.g., service error)

get.description: Retrieves counts of requests grouped by status or other criteria for the logged-in user.
get.summary: Get request counts

500.description: Error message for internal server error

get.description: Report mid sprint tasks
get.summary: Report mid sprint tasks

500.description: Error message for internal server error

get.description: Get retrospective report
get.summary: Get retrospective report

put.description: Marks all requests for a specific sprint as completed based on the sprint ID.
put.summary: Complete all requests for a specific sprint

400.description: error: Invalid sprint ID or service error

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tasks across requests, filtered by project, type, status, and workflow type for the logged-in user.
get.summary: Get request tasks by project and filters

500.description: Error message for internal server error

get.description: Retrieves the total count of tasks matching filter criteria like project, workflow type, and task type for the logged-in user.
get.summary: Get count of request tasks based on filters

500.description: Error message for internal server error

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific request ID for the logged-in user.
get.summary: Get request details

400.description: Error message for invalid request ID

500.description: Error message for internal server error

put.description: Updates details of an existing request identified by its ID. Requires user authentication.

400.description: Error message for invalid request ID or bad request body

500.description: Error message for internal server error

put.description: Cancels a request identified by its ID.

500.description: Error message for internal server error

put.description: Marks a specific request as completed based on its request ID.
